meanings.definition: The quality or state of being heedless.
meanings.sent1: Her constant heedlessnesses often led to accidents.
meanings.sent2: The teacher reminded the students to avoid heedlessnesses during the experiment.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, his heedlessnesses always seemed to get him into trouble.
meanings.sent4: The heedlessnesses of the hikers resulted in them getting lost in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of her heedlessnesses were finally catching up to her.

meanings.definition: The act of being careless or negligent.
meanings.sent1: The company suffered losses due to the employees' heedlessnesses.
meanings.sent2: His heedlessnesses at work often caused frustration among his colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The comedy of errors was a result of their collective heedlessnesses.
meanings.sent4: The heedlessnesses of the driver led to a fender bender on the highway.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of their heedlessnesses were far-reaching and costly.
